attributes.review: He f***ed a bowl of spaghetti

I was playing fortnite mobile and then all of a sudden, this app just opens with a bunch of pictures of trumps toupee all over my screen. Because of this app, I lost my 2 kill bomb on fortnite mobile to a bot. 0/9000 would not recommend.
attributes.title: SO GLITCHY

attributes.review: MY FRICKING DINOSAUR RAN AWAY BECAUSE THE INSTRUCTIONS WERE NOT CLEAR ENOUGH THIS IS ABSOLUTE BULL POOP AND I DEMAND THE WOMANAGER
attributes.title: MY DINOSAUR

attributes.review: first off, i started downloading this app 6 MONTHS ago and it JUST NOW downloaded!! first flaw there! second, it STOLE ALL of my credit card information!! whenever i tried to contact customer service or officials, they called me a “filthy alligator” that needs to “run back to the swamp” where i belong!!!!! 😱 HOW DISRESPECTFUL!!! I AM AN AMERICAN! this is no way to treat the american people 😡 it’s also important to note that every time i opened the app i smelt a weird, rancid odor?? whenever i close the app it goes away! it’s like: i open the app, am greeted by trump, and smell rotten farts and poop! HE’S THE POOPOOPEEPEE MAN!! anyway, i don’t recommend this app, it glitches and also screams racial slurs every time i press a button on there 😖
attributes.title: worst. app. EVER!!!! 🤬🤬

attributes.review: okay first of all this app took HOURS to download i thought it was the next day after it finally downloaded , second of all as soon as i opened the app it asked me to turn on notifications and i picked allow , the moment i did that i knew i made a mistake my phone WOULD NOT stop beeping due to notifications, i even powered my phone off to make the beeping stop and it just kept on , third of all my phone would not stop glitching and being slow after the app was downloaded. i do not recommend this app and i wish i could give it less than 1 star.

attributes.title: 𝒷𝒾𝓉𝒸𝒽 𝓍𝒾𝑒 𝒽𝓊𝒶 𝓅𝒾𝒶𝑜 𝓅𝒾𝒶𝑜 𝒷𝒾𝑒 𝒻𝑒𝓊𝓃𝑔 𝓈𝒽𝒾𝒶𝑜 𝓈𝒽𝒾𝒶𝑜

attributes.review: When I first downloaded the app, it wanted to send me notifications, like the audacity!!! Then they wanted my phone number, FOR WHAT???!!!?!!?!?! So they can SPY on me? Find out who I make calls to (my mommy so shut the f*** up). The marketing team did so poorly with this app. Their logo likes like the bootleg Titans Tower (TT>TTG.) The first face I see is a lightly dusted Cheetos, with hair that looks so fake it reminds me of middle school aged girls’ friendships. It was horrific, I’ll have nightmares for weeks. Never Again!
attributes.title: Worst App I Ever Used

attributes.review: The app took 1 year to download.Also the second I downloaded it my phone shut off for 30 days and it finally turned on and my wallpaper was changed to Trump, all my notifications said Trump.Then when I called people the contact name was Trump. And when I tried to change my wallpaper or anything it just shut back off for another 30 days.Also it says it’s free but it actually deducts $4000 from your credit card.
attributes.title: TOOK TO LONG TO DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: I tried downloading this app yesterday @4:20 on the 69th day after I was born and it LITERALLY DOWNLOADED LIKE WHO DOES THAT anyway this app is really bad and I won’t recommend it AT ALL
attributes.title: Listen I think you’ll hate it
